question:
Consider the following statements about the Bharat Interface for Money (BHIM):
  1. It is an initiative to enable payments through mobile phone
  2. It is interoperable with other Unified Payment Interface (UPI) applications
  3. It has been developed by the National Payment Corporation of India (NPCI)
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
All given statements are correct
Bharat Interface for Money is an initiative to enable payments through mobile phone. It is interoperable with other Unified Payment Interface (UPI) applications. It has been developed by National Payment Corporation of India.
